messages.subject: Re: vaCcination documentation
messages.msgSnippet: She sounds a lot like I did when my first child as born. I never actually looked into vaccinations, I was only going with the mainstream views. Maybe she has
messages.messageBody:
She sounds a lot like I did when my first child as
born. I never actually looked into vaccinations, I was
only going with the mainstream views. Maybe she has
looked into them, but I suspect not. She posted in her
blog a few months ago ranting at stupid people who
thought that autism was caused by vaccinations and how
very dangerous it was to not vaccinate your child.
